backend/src/api/middleware/auth_middlewa.description: Central authentication dependency get_auth_context has ENABLE_NOAUTH_MCP bypass that returns demo-user context without any Authorization header, affecting all routes that use this dependency

backend/src/api/routes/system.py.description: System routes (/api/system/logs and /api/system/debug/widget) now require admin authentication via require_admin_context. These endpoints expose sensitive information (system logs and widget.html content) and should only be accessible to administrators.
